title: Comparative Analysis and Application Strategies of Blended Block Instruction Models

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service teachers: comparative analysis of mobile-optimized blended learning models and exploration of practical implementation strategies

learning_goals: Comparing and analyzing the effectiveness of blended block and face-to-face instruction models based on the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework
Proposing at least two strategies for time flexibility and subject goal achievement in mobile-friendly blended learning design
Applying digital and face-to-face interaction techniques to improve learner engagement in actual lesson design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
